description: Generates a OVF descriptor (xml) for a vmdk intended for vSphere.
The OVF descriptor has minimal virtual hardware and no network.
Hardware and network can be configured during or after importing

vmdk.description: The vmdk image filename present in the root of the tree

vmware.description: Settings for VMWare specific parts of the OVF file.

virtualbox.description: Settings for VirtualBox specific parts of the OVF file.
